title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When I set the dynamic text element's Content Type property to Auto, Plain, or HTML, the report still displays the same results.
EB:
I expect different results depending on the Content Type property setting:
- For Plain, I expect the literal content (tags and all) to be displayed.
- For Auto, I expect content 1, 2, and 3 to appear properly without HTML or RTF tags.
- For HTML, I expect content 1 and 2 to appear properly without HTML tags, and content 3 to appear literally with RTF tags.
SR:
1. Open the attached report.
2. Set the dynamic text element's Content Type property to Plain.
3. Verify that the text content is displayed with HTML tags.
4. Set the dynamic text element's Content Type property to Auto.
5. Verify that content 1, 2, and 3 appear properly without HTML or RTF tags.
6. Set the dynamic text element's Content Type property to HTML.
7. Verify that content 1 and 2 appear properly without HTML tags, and content 3 appears literally with RTF tags.
